name: Pan Aroma Restaurant | Best Restaurant in Ponda, Goa

reviews.review_text:
"I had the pleasure of dining at Pan Aroma Restaurant with family and friends. And I must say, it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment we walked in, the warm and inviting ambiance set the tone for a fantastic meal.

The service was top-notch, with friendly and attentive staff who ensured our comfort and getting our orders on time.

But the real star of the show was the food â€“ oh the glorious food! We ordered a variety of dishes, and each one was more delicious than the last. I should specially mention Prawns Lollipop and The Chicken in Tender Coconut. The flavors were awesome, the presentation was impeccable, and the portions were generous.

I highly recommend Pan Aroma Restaurant to anyone looking for a exceptional dining experience.
Kudos to the entire Pan Aroma Team.

Highlights:

Exceptional service
Delicious and varied menu
options
Cozy and inviting ambiance
Generous portions
Reasonable prices
Best restaurant in Ponda, great food and friendly staff the owner is amazing as well love the fish thali and chicken In tender coconut

We recently had our team lunch at Pan Aroma. Great food, friendly staff that gives excellent service. All in all a superb experience at pocket friendly rates. Special thanks and appreciation to the owner who ensured we were all comfortable and taken care of in the best way!
